dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1207 : To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 306 River Street in Tilden, Texas, as the “Tilden Veterans Post Office”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 306 River Street in Tilden, Texas, as the Tilden Veterans Post Office.

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 306 River Street in Tilden, Texas, shall be known and designated as the Tilden Veterans Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Tilden Veterans Post Office.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives November 15, 2017.
